result.eng: You're not married yourself?

result.orig: Níl tú féin pósta
result.html: Níl tú féin póstaYou're not married yourself?
result.ponchtml: Níl tú féin póstaYou're not married yourself?

result.eng: Do you have children yourself?
result.ga: An bhfuil páistí agat féin
result.orig: An bhfuil páistí agat féin
result.html: An bhfuil páistí agat féinDo you have children yourself?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil páistí agat féinDo you have children yourself?

result.eng: I have four brothers and two sisters myself and I'm the third eldest.
result.ga: Tá ceathrar deartháir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sine
result.orig: Tá ceathrar deartháir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sine
result.html: Tá ceathrar deartháir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sineI have four brothers and two sisters myself and I'm the third eldest.
result.ponchtml: Tá ceaṫrar dearṫáir agus beirt deirfiúr agam féin agus is mise an tríú duine is sineI have four brothers and two sisters myself and I'm the third eldest.

result.eng: Where are you living yourself at the moment?
result.ga: Cá bhfuil tú féin i do chónaí faoi láthair
result.orig: Cá bhfuil tú féin i do chónaí faoi láthair
result.html: Cá bhfuil tú féin i do chónaí faoi láthairWhere are you living yourself at the moment?
result.ponchtml: Cá ḃfuil tú féin i do ċónaí faoi láṫairWhere are you living yourself at the moment?

result.eng: Are you musical yourself?
result.ga: An bhfuil ceol agat féin
result.orig: An bhfuil ceol agat féin
result.html: An bhfuil ceol agat féinAre you musical yourself?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil ceol agat féinAre you musical yourself?

result.eng: I'm salivating already!
result.ga: Tá uisce le m'fhiacla cheana féin
result.orig: Tá uisce le m'fhiacla cheana féin
result.html: Tá uisce le m'fhiacla cheana féinI'm salivating already!
result.ponchtml: Tá uisce le m'ḟiacla ċeana féinI'm salivating already!

result.eng: I knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.
result.ga: Thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an Eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liom
result.orig: Thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an Eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liom
result.html: Thuig mé féin dá bhféadfainn an Eoraip a bhaint amach go mbeadh liomI knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.
result.ponchtml: Ṫuig mé féin dá ḃféadfainn an Eoraip a ḃaint amaċ go mbeaḋ liomI knew well that if I could reach Europe, I would have succeeded.

result.eng: He was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ga: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.orig: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bith
result.html: Bhí sé ag breathnú ar an doras amhail is go bhféadfadh an t-áibhirseoir féin teacht isteach nóiméad ar bithHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ag breaṫnú ar an doras aṁail is go ḃféadfaḋ an t-áiḃirseoir féin teaċt isteaċ nóiméad ar biṫHe was looking at the door as if the devil himself could come in any minute.

result.eng: Herself and some other neighbourhood kids were playing hide and seek.
result.ga: Bhí sí féin agus páistí eile na comharsanachta ag déanamh na bhfolachán
result.orig: Bhí sí féin agus páistí eile na comharsanachta ag déanamh na bhfolachán
result.html: Bhí sí féin agus páistí eile na comharsanachta ag déanamh na bhfolachánHerself and some other neighbourhood kids were playing hide and seek.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí féin agus páistí eile na coṁarsanaċta ag déanaṁ na ḃfolaċánHerself and some other neighbourhood kids were playing hide and seek.

result.eng: He made a grimace.
result.ga: Chuir sé strainc air féin
result.orig: Chuir sé strainc air féin
result.html: Chuir sé strainc air féinHe made a grimace.
result.ponchtml: Ċuir sé strainc air féinHe made a grimace.

result.eng: She only had herself to blame.
result.ga: Mhill sí uirthi féin é
result.orig: Mhill sí uirthi féin é
result.html: Mhill sí uirthi féin éShe only had herself to blame.
result.ponchtml: Ṁill sí uirṫi féin éShe only had herself to blame.

result.eng: They used codewords among themselves.
result.ga: D'úsáid siad códfhocail eatarthu féin
result.orig: D'úsáid siad códfhocail eatarthu féin
result.html: D'úsáid siad códfhocail eatarthu féinThey used codewords among themselves.
result.ponchtml: D'úsáid siad códḟocail eatarṫu féinThey used codewords among themselves.

result.eng: During this employment no money was paid to herself.
result.ga: Le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féin
result.orig: Le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féin
result.html: Le linn na fostaíochta seo níor íocadh aon airgead léi féinDuring this employment no money was paid to herself.
result.ponchtml: Le linn na fostaíoċta seo níor íocaḋ aon airgead léi féinDuring this employment no money was paid to herself.

result.eng: It is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ga: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.orig: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainn
result.html: Is trua nach raibh JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a bhí ag an gceann a tháinig romhainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.
result.ponchtml: Is trua naċ raiḃ JFK moment ag ár nglúin féin mar a ḃí ag an gceann a ṫáinig roṁainnIt is a pity that our generation never had a "JFK moment" like the one that came before us.

result.eng: Readers and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ga: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.orig: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiú
result.html: Níor ghá gur thomhaltóirí nuachta iad an lucht léitheoireachta nó éisteachta a thuilleadh ach táirgeoirí a bheadh in inmhe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a bhailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.
result.ponchtml: Níor ġá gur ṫoṁaltóirí nuaċta iad an luċt léiṫeoireaċta nó éisteaċta a ṫuilleaḋ aċ táirgeoirí a ḃeaḋ in inṁe a gcuid tuairiscí féin a ḃailiúReaders and listeners did not have to be consumers of news anymore but producers who were able to collect their own reports.

result.eng: You didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ga: Ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.orig: Ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadh
result.html: Ní raibh aon ghá le heagarthóir a thuilleadh le do leagan féin de cheird na hiriseoireachta a chleachtadhYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.
result.ponchtml: Ní raiḃ aon ġá le heagarṫóir a ṫuilleaḋ le do leagan féin de ċeird na hiriseoireaċta a ċleaċtaḋYou didn't need an editor anymore to practise your own version of the journalistic trade.

result.eng: People get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.
result.ga: Is beag sásamh a bhaintear as athchúrsáil a dhéanamh ar ábhar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile cheana féin
result.orig: Is beag sásamh a bhaintear as athchúrsáil a dhéanamh ar ábhar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile cheana féin
result.html: Is beag sásamh a bhaintear as athchúrsáil a dhéanamh ar ábhar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile cheana féinPeople get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.
result.ponchtml: Is beag sásaṁ a ḃaintear as aṫċúrsáil a ḋéanaṁ ar áḃar atá ar fáil in áiteanna eile ċeana féinPeople get little satisfaction from recycling stuff that is already available elsewhere.

result.eng: You would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ga: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.orig: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féin
result.html: Thuigfeá d'éinne nach mbeadh ag iarraidh feannadh den chineál sin a tharraingt orthu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].
result.ponchtml: Ṫuigfeá d'éinne naċ mbeaḋ ag iarraiḋ feannaḋ den ċineál sin a ṫarraingt orṫu féinYou would understand why someone does not want to undergo that kind of skin stripping [ie. extreme criticism].

result.eng: Jamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ga: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
result.orig: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méide
result.html: Fágadh Séimí i gcuideachta scaifte eile páistí a bhí fána thuairim féin méideJamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.
result.ponchtml: Fágaḋ Séimí i gcuideaċta scaifte eile páistí a ḃí fána ṫuairim féin méideJamie was left among a pack of other children who were about his own size.

result.eng: I'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
result.ga: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin
result.orig: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féin
result.html: Tabharfaidh mé air a chuid smugachán dímhúinte a choinneáil aige féinI'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.
result.ponchtml: Taḃarfaiḋ mé air a ċuid smugaċán díṁúinte a ċoinneáil aige féinI'll make him keep his naughty brats at home.

result.eng: You're just like him!
result.ga: Tá tusa inchurtha leis féin
result.orig: Tá tusa inchurtha leis féin
result.html: Tá tusa inchurtha leis féinYou're just like him!
result.ponchtml: Tá tusa inċurṫa leis féinYou're just like him!

result.eng: Do you think that I am going to...?
result.ga: An síleann sibh chugaibh féin go bhfuil mé
result.orig: An síleann sibh chugaibh féin go bhfuil mé
result.html: An síleann sibh chugaibh féin go bhfuil méDo you think that I am going to...?
result.ponchtml: An síleann siḃ ċugaiḃ féin go ḃfuil méDo you think that I am going to...?

result.eng: How are you? - You can see yourself how we are.
result.ga: Goidé mar atá sibh - Goidé mar bheimis ach mar tí tú féin
result.orig: Goidé mar atá sibh - Goidé mar bheimis ach mar tí tú féin
result.html: Goidé mar atá sibh - Goidé mar bheimis ach mar tí tú féinHow are you? - You can see yourself how we are.
result.ponchtml: Goidé mar atá siḃ - Goidé mar ḃeimis aċ mar tí tú féinHow are you? - You can see yourself how we are.

result.eng: You should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ga: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.orig: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eile
result.html: Ba chóir duit bheith ag caint le do mhacasamhail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.
result.ponchtml: Ba ċóir duit ḃeiṫ ag caint le do ṁacasaṁail féin eileYou should talk to people of your own social standing.

result.eng: Going to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ga: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.orig: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadh
result.html: Ba dhoiligh a ghabháil chun faoiside Ina dhiaidh sin dar leis féin go gcaithfeadh sé an gealltanas a chomhlíonadhGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḋoiliġ a ġaḃáil ċun faoiside Ina ḋiaiḋ sin dar leis féin go gcaiṫfeaḋ sé an gealltanas a ċoṁlíonaḋGoing to confession was hard. Still, he felt he had to do as he had promised.

result.eng: Maybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ga: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.orig: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaí
result.html: B'fhéidir nach mbeadh sé mar seo an teaghlach á cur as seilbh da mbíodh sé féin níos tábhachtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.
result.ponchtml: B'ḟéidir naċ mbeaḋ sé mar seo an teaġlaċ á cur as seilḃ da mbíoḋ sé féin níos táḃaċtaíMaybe things wouldn't be like this [the family being evicted] if had been more economical/thrifty.

result.eng: It was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ga: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.orig: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féin
result.html: Ba doilig bheith ina gcuideachta gan a bheith mar dhuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.
result.ponchtml: Ba doilig ḃeiṫ ina gcuideaċta gan a ḃeiṫ mar ḋuine acu féinIt was difficult to be in with them without turning into one of them.

result.eng: The next morning Jamie was his old self again.
result.ga: Lá arna mhárach bhí Séimí arís ina chruth féin
result.orig: Lá arna mhárach bhí Séimí arís ina chruth féin
result.html: Lá arna mhárach bhí Séimí arís ina chruth féinThe next morning Jamie was his old self again.
result.ponchtml: Lá arna ṁáraċ ḃí Séimí arís ina ċruṫ féinThe next morning Jamie was his old self again.
